House Bill/Resolution NO. PS00065
FULL TITLE : PROBLEM OF CONTRACTUALIZATION
SHORT TITLE : Endo ( Contractualization)
ABSTRACT : Rep. Casilao focused on Party-List Anakpawis’ call to seize and stop the practice of labor contractualization that has long began even before the last presidential campaign. He expressed gladness that no less than President Rodrigo Roa Duterte had promised the abolition of contractualization as he noted that the latter had offered top positions in the Department of Labor and Employment (DOLE) to the members of the Left...; He related that he had manifested to the DOLE Secretary his desire to participate in the deliberations on the nullification of DOLE Department Order 18-A, Series of 2011 which he said the capitalists use to perpetuate the practice of labor contractualization...; stressed that he would file a bill providing for a national minimum wage to achieve a unified, national minimum wage, and subsequently touched on House Bill No. 556 or the AntiContractualization Bill. ...;added that he has also looked into the problem of contractualization of House employees and other government agencies since his advocacy includes not only workers in private but also in the public sector... (Source: House Journal No.20,pp.6-7)
